attributes.action: Support Ukraine's fight against Putin's aggression!
attributes.additional_details: If we are not prepared to fight for Ukraine we have to support the fight by any means we can. Putin showed that he will not stop on his own. He has to be stopped!
attributes.background:
1. Urgent military support, including air dome system
2. Block SWIFT
3. Block airlines, and access to ports for Russian companies
4. Personal sanctions on Russian politicians and oligarchs
5. Freeze foreign accounts of Russia
6.  Impose tariff on Russian oil. Diversify away from Russian gas

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457

On 28 February 2022 the Government announced further economic sanctions on Russia, which you can read about here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-statement-on-further-economic-sanctions-targeted-at-the-central-bank-of-the-russian-federation
